summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CRM multi-tenant solar leads management system. All 26 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing completed successfully - login, CRM filtering, sub-account creation with new fields (logos, legal texts, product type), and all pages (Dashboard, Leads, LPs, Forms, Analytics, Script Generator) working correctly with CRM filtering.

issues: Logo images show broken image placeholder when URL is invalid - consider adding fallback or validation

critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper CRM filtering implemented across all endpoints
Sub-account model includes all new fields: logo_left_url, logo_right_url, product_type, privacy_policy_text, legal_mentions_text
Frontend correctly passes selectedCRM to all API calls
seed_data_creation: Created test sub-account 'Test Solaire MDL' for Maison du Lead CRM with product_type=solaire, logos, and privacy policy text
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 features implemented and working: 1) CRM selector in sidebar filters all pages (Dashboard, Leads, LPs, Forms, Analytics, Script Generator), 2) Sub-account form has all new fields (logo_left_url, logo_right_url, product_type, privacy_policy_text, legal_mentions_text), 3) Legal texts display in popup modal, 4) Two CRMs available: 'Maison du Lead' and 'ZR7 Digital'. Existing 3 leads don't belong to any CRM's sub-accounts so they show 0 when filtered.
features_tested: CRM selector in sidebar filters Dashboard data - PASS
CRM selector filters Leads page - PASS
CRM selector filters Landing Pages - PASS
CRM selector filters Script Generator - PASS
Sub-account creation with all fields (name, domain, product_type, logos, legal texts) - PASS
